name: Abnormal Endurance
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavour_text: Tenacity prevails when hopes die.

name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavour_text: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

name: Aegis of the Heavens
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+7 until end of turn.
flavour_text: Inner strength is never seen until it makes all the difference.

name: Aerial Engineer
oracle_text: As long as you control an artifact, Aerial Engineer gets +2/+0 and has flying.
flavour_text: The best of their trade know every bolt of their rigs, stem to stern.

name: Aethershield Artificer
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavour_text: Most smiths shape metal, but some prefer more delicate materials.

name: Aether Tunnel
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
flavour_text: If you can't find a doorway, make one.

name: Aggressive Mammoth
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nOther creatures you control have trample.
flavour_text: "Approach from behind. That way, if it does charge, at least you aren't in front of it."\n?Vivien Reid

name: Air Elemental
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavour_text: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.

name: Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants
oracle_text: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.\n?2: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.\n?7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink."

name: Ajani's Influence
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.\nLook at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a white card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Ajani's Last Stand
oracle_text: Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control dies, you may sacrifice Ajani's Last Stand. If you do, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying.\nWhen a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, if you control a Plains, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying.

name: Ajani's Pridemate
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
flavour_text: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."\n?Jazal Goldmane

name: Ajani's Welcome
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavour_text: "You cannot defend others if your own well-being is neglected."

name: Ajani, Wise Counselor
oracle_text: +2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control.\n?3: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.\n?9: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total.

name: Alpine Moon
oracle_text: As Alpine Moon enters the battlefield, choose a nonbasic land card name.\nLands your opponents control with the chosen name lose all land types and abilities, and they gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavour_text: "A rare and fascinating phenomenon."\n?Tamiyo

name: Amulet of Safekeeping
oracle_text: Whenever you become the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {1}.\nCreature tokens get -1/-0.
flavour_text: Whether it is magical, lucky, or merely old, it is cherished, and that gives it power.

name: Angel of the Dawn
oracle_text: Flying\nWhen Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
flavour_text: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

name: Anticipate
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavour_text: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

name: Apex of Power
oracle_text: Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast nonland cards exiled this way.\nIf this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.
flavour_text: "As I desire, so it shall be." ?Nicol Bolas

name: Arcades, the Strategist
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance\nWhenever a creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.\nEach creature you control with defender assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

name: Arcane Encyclopedia
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Draw a card.
flavour_text: Knowledge itself is neither good nor evil. Just as the wrong book in the wrong hands could doom all existence, the same book in the right hands could save it.

name: Arisen Gorgon
oracle_text: Arisen Gorgon has deathtouch as long as you control a Liliana planeswalker. (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavour_text: "I'm not picky about what comes up, but the less decay, the better."\n?Liliana Vess

name: Aven Wind Mage
oracle_text: Flying\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavour_text: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

name: Aviation Pioneer
oracle_text: When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavour_text: "They say that perfection is unattainable, but they say that about flight too."

name: Banefire
oracle_text: Banefire deals X damage to any target.\nIf X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.
flavour_text: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

name: Befuddle
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
flavour_text: "The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still."

name: Blanchwood Armor
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

name: Blood Divination
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nDraw three cards.
flavour_text: Predicting the future is a messy business.

name: Boggart Brute
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavour_text: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

name: Bogstomper
flavour_text: "They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm."\n?Vivien Reid

name: Bone Dragon
oracle_text: Flying\n{3},{B},{B}, Exile seven other cards from your graveyard: Return Bone Dragon from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavour_text: Its roar is the clatter of a thousand bones.

name: Bone to Ash
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.\nDraw a card.
flavour_text: "I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."\n?Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Brawl-Bash Ogre
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nWhenever Brawl-Bash Ogre attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Brawl-Bash Ogre gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Bristling Boar
oracle_text: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavour_text: "Nicol Bolas destroyed my world. I owe it to Skalla to celebrate all life, no matter how dangerous."\n?Vivien Reid

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavour_text: "I decide what stands in my way."

name: Catalyst Elemental
oracle_text: Sacrifice Catalyst Elemental: Add {R},{R}.
flavour_text: As the hyperstormic generator crept past redline, a being emerged from the arc.

name: Cavalry Drillmaster
oracle_text: When Cavalry Drillmaster enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Centaur Courser
flavour_text: "The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."\n?Ramal, sage of Westgate

name: Chaos Wand
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of that library in a random order.

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavour_text: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Chromium, the Mutable
oracle_text:
Flash
This spell can't be countered.
Flying
Discard a card: Until end of turn, Chromium, the Mutable becomes a Human with base power and toughness 1/1, loses all abilities, and gains hexproof. It can't be blocked this turn.

name: Cinder Barrens
oracle_text: Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavour_text: "I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine."\n?Nicol Bolas

name: Cleansing Nova
oracle_text: Choose one ?\n? Destroy all creatures.\n? Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
flavour_text: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

name: Colossal Dreadmaw
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavour_text: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

name: Colossal Majesty
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
flavour_text: "Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them."\n?Inti, Sun Empire knight

name: Court Cleric
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)\nCourt Cleric gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Ajani planeswalker.
flavour_text: "The healers of Bant are second to none. I owe then a great deal for their tutelage."\n?Ajani Goldmane

name: Crash Through
oracle_text: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nDraw a card.

name: Crucible of Worlds
oracle_text: You may play land cards from your graveyard.
flavour_text: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

name: Daggerback Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavour_text: Its ventricles weep venom, and it consumes only poison.

name: Dark-Dweller Oracle
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)
flavour_text: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.

name: Daybreak Chaplain
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavour_text: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."

name: Death Baron
oracle_text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
flavour_text: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

name: Declare Dominance
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. All creatures able to block it this turn do so.
flavour_text: "If you think yourself a chief, then prove your might."\n?Gar-Tun, Mistvalley silverback

name: Demanding Dragon
oracle_text: Flying\nWhen Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.
flavour_text: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.

name: Demon of Catastrophes
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nFlying, trample
flavour_text: A pit yawned open, a column of oily smoke arose, and a towering form hissed, "I accept this offering."

name: Departed Deckhand
oracle_text: When Departed Deckhand becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.\nDeparted Deckhand can't be blocked except by Spirits.\n{3},{U}: Another target creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by Spirits.

name: Desecrated Tomb
oracle_text: Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.
flavour_text: The grave robbers were startled, for the door to the mausoleum was already open.

name: Detection Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.\n{1}, {T}: Until end of turn, your opponents and creatures your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.
flavour_text: Its light exposes enemies and lays secrets bare.

name: Diamond Mare
oracle_text: As Diamond Mare enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nWhenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, you gain 1 life.
flavour_text: When it passes, rainbows follow.

name: Diregraf Ghoul
oracle_text: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.
flavour_text: "At least this one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs."\n?Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Dismissive Pyromancer
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.\n{2},{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Dismissive Pyromancer: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavour_text: "Burn. Burn. Keep. Burn".

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavour_text: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.

name: Divination
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavour_text: "The stars mark your destiny. May you accept the fate thus divulged."

name: Djinn of Wishes
oracle_text: Flying\nDjinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.\n{2},{U},{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

name: Doomed Dissenter
oracle_text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavour_text: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

name: Doublecast
oracle_text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavour_text: First the insult, then the encore.

name: Draconic Disciple
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.\n{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Draconic Disciple: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavour_text: "If I am to die, I will die in the embrace of an immeasurable flame."

name: Dragon Egg
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWhen Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavour_text: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

name: Dragon's Hoard
oracle_text: Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.\n{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Druid of Horns
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an Aura spell that targets Druid of Horns, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavour_text: No welcome for those who trespass. Only fang and horn and claw.

name: Druid of the Cowl
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavour_text: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."

name: Dryad Greenseeker
oracle_text: {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
flavour_text: "The land already knows its destiny. I simply ask it to share the tale with me."

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavour_text: "It hurts more if you think about it."\n?Hooks, Cabal torturer

name: Dwarven Priest
oracle_text: When Dwarven Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavour_text: "These storied halls are under my protection."

name: Dwindle
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -6/-0.\nWhen enchanted creature blocks, destroy it. (The attacking creature remains blocked.)
flavour_text: The collection didn't have room to expand, so the wizard improvised a solution.

name: Electrify
oracle_text: Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavour_text: "Some hid from the storm. I embraced it and learned its name."

name: Elvish Clancaller
oracle_text: Other Elves you control get +1/+1.\n{4},{G},{G}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Elvish Clancaller, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
flavour_text: No single root feeds the forest.

name: Elvish Rejuvenator
oracle_text: When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Enigma Drake
oracle_text: Flying\nEnigma Drake's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
flavour_text: Many initiates believe it possesses secrets beyond imagining. Many have become meals trying to learn them.

name: Epicure of Blood
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavour_text: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

name: Essence Scatter
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavour_text: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

name: Exclusion Mage
oracle_text: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavour_text: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.

name: Explosive Apparatus
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Explosive Apparatus: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavour_text: "Souls are volatile things. When compressed and loaded into a handheld device, their destructive potential is quite impressive."\n?Dierk, geistmage

name: Fell Specter
oracle_text: Flying\nWhen Fell Specter enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.\nWhenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.

name: Field Creeper
flavour_text: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.

name: Fiery Finish
oracle_text: Fiery Finish deals 7 damage to target creature.
flavour_text: Negotiations reached an abrupt conclusion.

name: Fire Elemental
flavour_text: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.

name: Forsaken Sanctuary
oracle_text: Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
flavour_text: "Prayers will curdle on the tongue and be heard by rotting ears."\n?Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

name: Foul Orchard
oracle_text: Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavour_text: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.

name: Fountain of Renewal
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.\n{3}, Sacrifice Fountain of Renewal: Draw a card.
flavour_text: Entrepreneurs have attempted to sell the water, but to no avail. Whatever magic it contains disappears upon bottling.

name: Fraying Omnipotence
oracle_text: Each player loses half their life, then discards half the cards in their hand, then sacrifices half the creatures they control. Round up each time.
flavour_text: The Great Mending that healed the Multiverse also unraveled the threads of Nicol Bolas's power.

name: Frilled Sea Serpent
oracle_text: {5},{U},{U}: Frilled Sea Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
flavour_text: "Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"\n?Gertrude, deep-sea angler

name: Gallant Cavalry
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nWhen Gallant Cavalry enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
flavour_text: "Our duty does not stop at our borders."

name: Gargoyle Sentinel
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\n{3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.
flavour_text: "Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to."\n?Bonovar, siege commander

name: Gearsmith Guardian
oracle_text: Gearsmith Guardian gets +2/+0 as long as you control a blue creature.
flavour_text: Made in its creator's image, though slightly more clangy.

name: Gearsmith Prodigy
oracle_text: Gearsmith Prodigy gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.
flavour_text: Young artificers on Kaladesh let their imaginations run wild.

name: Ghastbark Twins
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nGhastbark Twins can block an additional creature each combat.
flavour_text: They grow closer with every passing season.

name: Ghirapur Guide
oracle_text: {2},{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
flavour_text: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.

name: Ghostform
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.
flavour_text: "Picking locks is for beginners."

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavour_text: "After everything I've survived, it's hard to be frightened by anything anymore."\n?Vivien Reid

name: Gift of Paradise
oracle_text: Enchant land\nWhen Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.\nEnchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: Gigantosaurus
flavour_text: "Each tooth is the length of a horse, and new ones grow in every sixteen days. Let's get a closer look!"\n?Vivien Reid

name: Goblin Instigator
oracle_text: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
flavour_text: "We can take 'em. You go first!"

name: Goblin Motivator
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavour_text: Small words stoke large flames.

name: Goblin Trashmaster
oracle_text: Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.\nSacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target artifact.
flavour_text: "Folks 'round here are too in love with their contraptions. Does them some good if we smash every one so often."

name: Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma
oracle_text: Creature spells you cast with power 4 or greater cost {2} less to cast.\nWhenever Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma attacks, each creature you control with power 4 or greater gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavour_text: You don't want to know how she got that name.

name: Grasping Scoundrel
oracle_text: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.
flavour_text: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavour_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer?both are attractive to thieves.

name: Gravewaker
oracle_text: Flying\n{5},{B},{B}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavour_text: Once every seven years it flies on spectral wings over the moors of ancient battlefields.

name: Graveyard Marshal
oracle_text: {2},{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavour_text: "Rise and shine, my dears. We have work to do."\n?Isareth the Awakener

name: Greenwood Sentinel
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavour_text: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.

name: Guttersnipe
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavour_text: "I found a new toy. Wanna play?"

name: Havoc Devils
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavour_text: For devils, burning things is the highest form of comedy, diversion, and artistic expression.

name: Herald of Faith
oracle_text: Flying\nWhenever Herald of Faith attacks, you gain 2 life.
flavour_text: The clerics prayed for salvation. The soldiers prayed for victory. Both prayers were answered.

name: Heroic Reinforcements
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavour_text: Cries of anguish quickly spurred cries of action.

name: Hieromancer's Cage
oracle_text: When Hieromancer's Cage enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Hieromancer's Cage leaves the battlefield.
flavour_text: Law protects but it also contains.

name: Highland Game
oracle_text: When Highland Game dies, you gain 2 life.
flavour_text: "Bring down a stag and fix its horns upon Arel's head. She hears the wisdom of our ancestors."\n?Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

name: Highland Lake
oracle_text: Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
flavour_text: "A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure . . . Nah."\n?Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab

name: Hired Blade
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
flavour_text: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."

name: Horizon Scholar
oracle_text: Flying\nWhen Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Hostile Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavour_text: The bellow of minotaur always translates to "charge."

name: Hungering Hydra

name: Infectious Horror
oracle_text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavour_text: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

name: Infernal Reckoning
oracle_text: Exile target colorless creature. You gain life equal to its power.

name: Infernal Scarring
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
flavour_text: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

name: Inferno Hellion
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nAt the beginning of each end step, if Inferno Hellion attacked or blocked this turn, its owner shuffles it into their library.

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavour_text: "Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, ? and they were barely a tenth of our number!" ?General Avitora

name: Invoke the Divine
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavour_text: "Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light."\n?Song of All, canto 1008

name: Isareth the Awakener
oracle_text: Deathtouch\nWhenever Isareth the Awakener attacks, you may pay {X}. When you do, return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a corpse counter on it. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

name: Isolate
oracle_text: Exile target permanent with converted mana cost 1.
flavour_text: Threefold were his crimes, doubled were his pleas, singular was his fate.

name: Kargan Dragonrider
oracle_text: As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavour_text: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

name: Knightly Valor
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nWhen Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

name: Knight of the Tusk
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavour_text: "Horse? Who needs a horse?"

name: Knight's Pledge
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavour_text: "As long as my faith persists, so shall I."

name: Lathliss, Dragon Queen
oracle_text: Flying\nWhenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.\n{1},{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavour_text: "Catch!"

name: Lena, Selfless Champion
oracle_text: When Lena, Selfless Champion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each nontoken creature you control.\nSacrifice Lena: Creatures you control with power less than Lena's power gain indestructible until end of turn.
flavour_text: "Those who do evil and those who do nothing are equally worthy of contempt."

name: Leonin Vanguard
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, Leonin Vanguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.
flavour_text: The best fighters are skilled in both harming and healing.

name: Leonin Warleader
oracle_text: Whenever Leonin Warleader attacks, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink that are tapped and attacking.
flavour_text: When one leonin hunts, many more are surely nearby.

name: Lich's Caress
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You gain 3 life.
flavour_text: A lich must consume mortal souls to feed its eternal life.

name: Lightning Mare
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.\nLightning Mare can't be blocked by blue creatures.\n{1},{R}: Lightning Mare gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavour_text: When it passes, storm clouds bolt across the land.

name: Lightning Strike
oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
flavour_text: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

name: Liliana's Contract
oracle_text: When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.
flavour_text: Immortality is worth any price.

name: Liliana's Spoils
oracle_text: Target opponent discards a card.\nLook at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a black card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Liliana, the Necromancer
oracle_text: +1: Target player loses 2 life.\n?1: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.\n?7: Destroy up to two target creatures. Put up to two creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Liliana, Untouched by Death
oracle_text: +1: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. If at least one of them is a Zombie card, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.\n?2: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control.\n?3: You may cast Zombie cards from your graveyard this turn.

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavour_text: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.

name: Loxodon Line Breaker
flavour_text: Loxodons are firm in stature and spirit. No matter the odds, they are always first into battle.

name: Luminous Bonds
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavour_text: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."

name: Macabre Waltz
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
flavour_text: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

name: Magistrate's Scepter
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Magistrate's Scepter.\n{T}, Remove three charge counters from Magistrate's Scepter: Take an extra turn after this one.

name: Make a Stand
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
flavour_text: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.

name: Manalith
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavour_text: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unknowingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.

name: Marauder's Axe
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavour_text: A sharp axe solves most problems.

name: Meandering River
oracle_text: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavour_text: The river split into many channels as it flowed to the Halimar Sea. Few travelers could follow the same one twice.

name: Mentor of the Meek
oracle_text: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
flavour_text: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

name: Metamorphic Alteration
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nAs Metamorphic Alteration enters the battlefield, choose a creature.\nEnchanted creature is a copy of the chosen creature.

name: Meteor Golem
oracle_text: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
flavour_text: The impact sent the soldiers scattering?then something came out of the crater.

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavour_text: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

name: Militia Bugler
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nWhen Militia Bugler enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with power 2 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Millstone
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavour_text: Minds, like mountains, are never so grand and mighty that they can't be reduced to dust.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavour_text: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

name: Mirror Image
oracle_text: You may have Mirror Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature you control.
flavour_text: The life of a shapeshifter is one of constant change.

name: Mistcaller
oracle_text: Sacrifice Mistcaller: Until end of turn, if a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
flavour_text: Hospitality is of little concern to those who do not wish to be disturbed.

name: Mist-Cloaked Herald
oracle_text: Mist-Cloaked Herald can't be blocked.
flavour_text: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavour_text: "It's not work if you enjoy it."

name: Mystic Archaeologist
oracle_text: {3},{U},{U}: Draw two cards.
flavour_text: The delight of discovery drives the pursuit of knowledge.

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Nexus of Fate
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one.\nIf Nexus of Fate would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Nexus of Fate and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

name: Nightmare's Thirst
oracle_text: You gain 1 life. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
flavour_text: That feeling of something on your chest is usually sleep paralysis. Occasionally, it's something else.

name: Novice Knight
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nAs long as Novice Knight is enchanted or equipped, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavour_text: Even the greatest hero begins with nothing.

name: Oakenform
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavour_text: "When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"\n?Dionus, elvish archdruid

name: Omenspeaker
oracle_text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavour_text: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

name: Omniscience
oracle_text: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
flavour_text: "The things I once imagined would be my greatest achievements were only the first steps toward a future I can only begin to fathom."\n? Jace Beleren

name: Onakke Ogre
flavour_text: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.

name: One with the Machine
oracle_text: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among artifacts you control.
flavour_text: "When I grafted the Planar Bridge into myself, I felt my Planeswalker spark flare beyond my body. The Multiverse was my plaything. It felt . . . incredible."\n?Tezzeret

name: Open the Graves
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavour_text: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.

name: Oreskos Swiftclaw
flavour_text: The leonin of Oreskos are quick to take offense?not because they are thin-skinned but because they are always ready for a fight.

name: Palladia-Mors, the Ruiner
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance, trample\nPalladia-Mors, the Ruiner has hexproof if it hasn't dealt damage yet.

oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.

name: Revitalize

oracle_text: +1: Draw a card.\n0: Until your next turn, target artifact you control becomes a 5/5 creature in addition to its other types.\n?7: Put any number of cards from your hand onto the battlefield face down. They're 5/5 artifact creatures.

oracle_text: When Tezzeret's Gatebreaker enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a blue or artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\n{5},{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Tezzeret's Gatebreaker: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

name: Tezzeret's Strider
oracle_text: As long as you control a Tezzeret planeswalker, Tezzeret's Strider has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavour_text: "More obedient than any dog."\n?Tezzeret

name: Thornhide Wolves
flavour_text: "Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly."\n?Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Thorn Lieutenant
oracle_text: Whenever Thorn Lieutenant becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.\n{5},{G}: Thorn Lieutenant gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Thud
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nThud deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavour_text: "Give 'em a push."\n?Mogwin, goblin delinquent

name: Timber Gorge
oracle_text: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavour_text: Tazeem's embrace is harsh, but for those that call it home, nothing else will do.

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavour_text: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

name: Tolarian Scholar
flavour_text: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kinds of experiments that ruined the original island of Tolaria.

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.\nDraw two cards.
flavour_text: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?" ?Sarkhan Vol

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavour_text: Fblthp had always hated crowds.

name: Tranquil Expanse
oracle_text: Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavour_text: Beyond the chaos of Ghirapur lies a vibrant world where aether flows through nature.

name: Transmogrifying Wand
oracle_text: Transmogrifying Wand enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.\n{1}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Transmogrifying Wand: Destroy target creature. Its controller creates a 2/4 white Ox creature token. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavour_text: The sound of the trumpets lights a fire in the hearts of the bold and snuffs the courage of the cowardly.

name: Trusty Packbeast
oracle_text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavour_text: "Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."\n?Hewen Frit, merchant

name: Two-Headed Zombie
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavour_text: "Thread the torsos together with angel hair to ensure they will cooperate in battle."\n?The Stitcher's Tome

name: Uncomfortable Chill
oracle_text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
flavour_text: The cold slowed their movements until only their panicked eyeballs swiveled beneath the ice.

name: Ursine Champion
oracle_text: {5},{G}: Ursine Champion gets +3/+3 and becomes a Bear Berserker until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavour_text: "Would you rather feel the edge of blade or the sharpness of my fangs?"

name: Vaevictis Asmadi, the Dire
oracle_text: Flying\nWhenever Vaevictis Asmadi, the Dire attacks, for each player, choose target permanent that player controls. Those players sacrifice those permanents. Each player who sacrificed a permanent this way reveals the top card of their library, then puts it onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card.

name: Valiant Knight
oracle_text: Other Knights you control get +1/+1.\n{3},{W},{W}: Knights you control gain double strike until end of turn.
flavour_text: "Defeat is no reason for retreat. It is a sign we must redouble our efforts to win this fight."

name: Vampire Neonate
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavour_text: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.

name: Vampire Sovereign
oracle_text: Flying\nWhen Vampire Sovereign enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
flavour_text: "Your service shall be rewarded."\n?Queen Lian

name: Viashino Pyromancer
oracle_text: When Viashino Pyromancer enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavour_text: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."

name: Vigilant Baloth
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavour_text: Villagers employ watchdogs as guardians and companions. Druids prefer something a little bigger.

name: Vine Mare
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)\nVine Mare can't be blocked by black creatures.
flavour_text: When it passes, the dead are displaced by flourishing life.

name: Vivien of the Arkbow
oracle_text: +2: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.\n?3: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.\n?9: Creatures you control get +4/+4 and gain trample until end of turn.

name: Vivien Reid
oracle_text: +1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\n?3: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.\n?8: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible."

name: Vivien's Invocation
oracle_text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. When a creature is put onto the battlefield this way, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

name: Vivien's Jaguar
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\n{2},{G}: Return Vivien's Jaguar from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you control a Vivien planeswalker.
flavour_text: Each of Vivien's arrows is an invocation of a species.

name: Volcanic Dragon
oracle_text: Flying\nHaste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavour_text: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

name: Volley Veteran
oracle_text: When Volley Veteran enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.
flavour_text: "Fill the sky with stuff!"

name: Walking Corpse
flavour_text: "Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."\n?Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Wall of Mist
oracle_text: Defender
flavour_text: The seafloor is flecked with the bones of fools who dared sail into the mist.

name: Wall of Vines
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nReach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavour_text: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

name: Waterknot
oracle_text: Enchant creature\nWhen Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Windreader Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying\nWhenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.
flavour_text: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

name: Woodland Stream
oracle_text: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavour_text: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.
